posts.description: The Latest In Classroom Protection: A Handheld Bulletproof Whiteboard | Popular Science
posts.extended: I just found out there's a terrible bulletproof whiteboard product, for protection during school shootings?  Awful
RT @gelicia: @mrejfox have you ever looked into something like this? these guys donated stuff to a hackathon once and it was nice

posts.description: Tactics may put Oakland police at a disadvantage - San Francisco Chronicle
posts.extended: RT @davidcolburn: CM Gallo on OPD: "It's just poor management. The protesters are better organized than our Police Department."  #oakmtg
